children.name: MoonPay
children.details: MoonPay is a global payment gateway that allows users to purchase cryptocurrencies using traditional payment methods like credit cards, debit cards, bank transfers, and other payment methods. It serves as an on-ramp for users to convert fiat currencies into cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and others.
